verifyFromDB

                                                                                int version)
Verify the structure of a TvnFile from the database.

Parameters:
structure - : the structure of the Tvn File
version - : the version for which the file needs to be verified
Returns:
the structure of the TvnFile with information retrieved from database lookup.

getSubFolders

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSubFolders(java.util.ArrayList<com.tbitsglobal.tvncore.TvnType> structure,

                                                                  int version,
                                                                  com.tbitsglobal.tvncore.UserInfo user)
                                                           throws com.tbitsglobal.tvncore.TvnException
Populate the subfolders for the given structure, version and user.

Parameters:
structure - : the present structure of the Tvn File
subType - : the Tvn Type immediately following the present structure
user - : the user for whom the subfolders need to be shown. The user access permissions are checked and subfolders shown accordingly.
Throws:
com.tbitsglobal.tvncore.TvnException
